page.title: 15The Brecon Mountain Railway.
page.content: Merthyr's newest tourist attraction is the Brecon Mountain Railway which starts its journey at Pant railway station and runs into the magnificent Brecon Beacons National Park.Two miles of line is now open with a further 8 miles to open at a later date.It is a narrow gauge railway with some very attractive engines and passenger coaches. During last Summer term our class went on the railway as part of our project on transport.It was really exciting travelling on a steam train. The driver sounded the hooter as we set off.The view from the train is really beautiful.We saw mountains and reservoirs and wild primroses.When we got off the train we had a picnic and watched the sailing boats on the reservoir.On the way back some of us pretended to be engine drivers.
